div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1289 Mylasa, Caria, 1968-9 Burial: c. 300 B.C. (M) Contents: 143 AE Alexander III: 4 Philip III: 4 Miletus: 1 (as BMC 76 ff.) Caunus: 4 (as BMC 1 f. [1]; 3 ff. [3]) Halicarnassus: 2 (as BMC 18 f.) Iasus: 2 (female hd. r./crayfish r.) Idyma: 3 (as Monn. gr. p. 311, no. 66 [1]; SNGCop. 420 [2]) Mylasa: 62 (as Akarça no. 33 [15] no. 35 [47]) Myndus: 7 (as Akarça no. 20) Rhodes: 54 (as BMC 70 ff. [4]; 74 ff. [20]; 324 ff. [11]; 327 ff. [14]) Disposition: London 25 Information on file in BM See no. 1290 below
